text: iṉṉum, avarkaḷ ettakaiyōreṉṟāl taṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṉ poruttattait tēṭi, poṟumaiyaik kaṭaippiṭippārkaḷ; toḻukaiyaiyum nilainiṟuttuvārkaḷ; nām avarkaḷukku aḷittatiliruntu irakaciyamākavum, pakiraṅkamākavum (naṉmuṟaiyil) celavu ceyvārkaḷ; naṉmaiyaik koṇṭē tīmaiyait taṭuttuk koḷvārkaḷ. Ittakaiyōrukkē maṟumaiyil (cavaṉapati yeṉṉum) nalla vīṭu irukkiṟatu
